title: Ofcom report shows growing 5G coverage
description: One in five mobile phones is now capable of using 5G, but some consumers say speed is disappointing.

title: TikTok tests landscape videos in major shake-up
description: The world's fastest-growing social media platform has become known globally for its vertical format.

title: Elon Musk sells $3.6bn of shares in electric car maker Tesla
description: The sale brings the total of Tesla stocks sold by Mr Musk over the past year to almost $40bn.

title: Twitter briefly suspends @ElonJet account tracking Musk's jet
description: Twitter owner Elon Musk's critics say the suspension contradicts his avowed commitment to free speech.
